data.name: Koikoi Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This Soundtrack of Koikoi contains 33 MP3's format tracks which are used in the game and made by Radical Hyena.

--Contents Location after it was downloaded--
1. Right click the product of Koikoi in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
2. Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
3. Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a Koikoi Soundtrack file.





Track list(May some spoilers of Koikoi are included):


1 It's still yesterday
2 Forest
3 Opponent!
4 Victory
5 Battle Against Othello
6 Game Over
7 Need
8 Ghost town
9 Enemy
10 Totter Beat
11 Battle Against Quadre
12 Hope
13 Bigrobin
14 Arena
15 Battle Against Icepop
16 Gastown
17 Break Time
18 Beats inside him
19 Mansion
20 Drunkard Beat
21 Battle Against Hydra
22 Love and Peace
23 Sea of Trees
24 After Death
25 Warning
26 I scream.
27 Special enemy
28 Hydrangea
29 Enemy Noise
30 Battle Against Redhand
31 Hello Tomorrow
32 Goodbye Tomorow
33 Sweet Dream
